short_summary: Request for Proposal for Technical Writer Services
description: Health Canada requires one (1) senior level and one (1) Intermediate level Technical Writer to provide technical writer support for Government of Canada business processes, strategic planning requirements, change management initiatives and benefits management documents, processes and other required documents/process mapping/strategic information/technical schematics and other data to be integrated into the branch's business and strategic planning requirements. The period of any resulting contract will be from the date of contract award to 3 years after inclusive.
full_summary:
====================================

### Title
Technical Writer Professional Services in Support of the Dental Task Force Team / [Service professionnel de rédacteur technique à l'appui de l'équipe du Groupe de travail sur les soins dentaires] {#title}

### Reference and Solicitation Information
------------------------------------------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01022844
*   **Solicitation Number**: 1000249261
*   **Publication Date**: January 24, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 10, 2023, 14:00:00

### Tender Description

The Health Canada (HC) Contracting Authority is seeking a Technical Writer Professional Services contract in support of the Dental Task Force Team at the Strategic Policy Branch (SPB). The scope of work includes providing technical writer support for the preparation and production of strategic documents, integration of documents into HC's business and strategic planning requirements, change management, and process mapping. The successful bidder must be able to provide professional technical writing services to two levels of complexity: intermediate and senior writers.

The requirement is open to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the category 3.10 – Technical Writer – Level 2 (intermediate) and 3.10 – Technical Writer – Level 3 (senior). The period of any resulting contract will be from the date of contract award to 3 years after the date of contract expiry.

### Contracting Authority Information
--------------------------------

*   **Contracting Authority**: Health Canada (HC)
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   **Name**: Hyde, Thomas
    *   **Email**: [thomas.hyde@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.hyde@hc-sc.gc.ca)
    *   **Phone**: 343-204-2699

### Submitting a Proposal
-------------------------

All proposals must be submitted electronically through the [Canada Business Network](https://canadabusiness.ca/) portal. Bidder's must ensure that all mandatory documents and information are included in the proposal package.

### Important Dates
-------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date**: February 10, 2023, 14:00:00
*   **Proposal Submission Deadline**: Same as above
